data.what_is:
Zymplify's data-driven marketing and sales platform has all the tools you need to supercharge your business growth. 

We help businesses grow and reach new customers through multi-channel campaigns. Turning strangers into prospects and prospects into customers. All from one easy to use dashboard.

Activate the power of intent data to discover live in-market buyers, orchestrate multi-channel marketing campaigns at scales, and convert leads fast using our powerful platform features.
data.product_description: Zymplify is an all-in-one sales and marketing automation software.We help you scale your business - fast.  We combine the strengths of inbound and outbound marketing and sales to create a powerful customer acquisition platform.Zymplify finds the contact details of hundreds of quality prospects each day to put your marketing messaging in front of and nurture into hot leads ready for your sales team to close - all 100% automated.Our dashboard and tools are easy to use and quick to implement, start seeing the results within days and new sales converting within weeks.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Based on 31 Zymplify reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Based on 26 Zymplify reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: Based on 24 Zymplify reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: Based on 30 Zymplify reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Based on 28 Zymplify reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Based on 29 Zymplify reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Based on 19 Zymplify reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Based on 29 Zymplify reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: Based on 53 Zymplify reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Based on 49 Zymplify reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Based on 49 Zymplify reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading

Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: Based on 42 Zymplify reviews. Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices.

features.content: Based on 28 Zymplify reviews. Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores.

Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors. Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.name: SEO / Keyword Analytics
features.content: Based on 39 Zymplify reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors.

initial_reviews.review_title: Intuitive, easy to use, efficient and saves my hours upon hours of time
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
Zymplify has allowed me to collect data at an extremely fast rate, the system has saved my weeks of research and allows me to target audiences, by country, region, service type and all in a simple managabe way

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
I honestly cant think og one down side of the system, I would 110% recommend to anyone in the sales sector

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
There are few ways Zimplify is solving problems, main problem is collection of data, I havent coke across another system that gathers data at such speed, but then allow ne to separate in to specific buckets for email send outs and campaigns in bulk, Designing of emails is very simple and allows you to create the content you want.

initial_reviews.review_title: A very solid platform for new business CRM programs.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
First and foremost, when using a new platform, you want personal attention and education. Zymplify does that in spades. Our contact, Rebecca, couldn't be more attentive, kind, or smarter. We truly appreciate her, and her knowledge, advice, and leadership.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
It's not really a dislike. And it's probably not a fair dislike as we are a small agency and a couple of us use the platform while we perform our full-time executive roles. It would be better for us to have a FT person in this role but we don't. That said, the Zymplify platform is very robust. There's no way to understand the depths of all it offers on Day 1. So sometimes you learn new features or hacks as you go through the process and wish - 'I wish I knew that earlier.' Although they created a custom Playbook which is amazing, what would help would be a Playbook from Day 1 with a structured course, teacher, and assignments. Like a class at a university. Then we could always look back through the PDF course book, and easily remember where we were or what we needed to do again.

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
Zymplify really helps us think more strategically about how we approach new business, keeps us on a path to follow-up in a timely and effective manner and helps reveal new insights we would not have otherwise thought of.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great Account Managers and Support, but lead quality not sufficient
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
Zimplify assigned me with a great Account Manager Suzanne, who was always on hand to help with anything we needed. From training, supervising important tasks, to answering support queries and following up, she was always there to ensure Paynetworx was happy.
The platform itself is good as a CRM system, it has a lot of good functionalities and allows you to do automation well. It's ideal for a company that has multiple sales people so the marketing can be streamlined and automated.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
There is no instagram plugin so I didnt use it for social media scheduling if i cant do everything on it at once.
The quality of the leads, some numbers are invalid, some numbers are missing, and most of the numbers are landline numbers that do not lead to the contact that has been revealed. This means for the leads we wanted access to, the quality we were expecting was not reflected with the data from the third party company.

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automation and viewing the results in an easy way.

initial_reviews.review_title: Some improvement areas- but great platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
User interface experience
Data capture and prospecting tools
Intelligence of buyer signals
Ability to flow into a CRM function
Could Compare favourably vs our own CRM but leaves little scope for integration with finance and dealing with "tickets" or  "support" cases and CRM is not the main function of the platform as far as I can see.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
The inability to write into an API or gain an API to create integration with our own COTS CRM (Sage) / Sage ERP (200)
The amount of emails that land in junk from campaign and journey builds , what's the point in acquiring more credits if existing credits are not being picked up.

Recommendations to others considering Zymplify:
Have a look and see what it'll cost you to have
Sales Force, Mail Chimp, an ERP, lead forensic type tools, sales intelligent and prospecting tools and linkedin and marketing platform integrations and price it all up.
You dont need to really- it's all here. If it spoke to financial reporting systems through codeless integration technologies out there, it would be a game changer potentially for cloud/ cloud connected applications

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
Problems solved is reach- it gives us reach and automation, as long as we have good content and messaging.
Without the engine, we would be using 3/4 different tools
Performance is always improving as we are guided by their customer success and self learning platform, up to us to use it

initial_reviews.review_title: Good but difficult to navigate
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
Option to pull professional resources from LinkedIn. Also, most of the contact information is vetted before pushing it out. Very few had errors but otherwise great. The support team was truly incredible - they were eager and willing to provide support - they were very thorough in the level of training that they provided.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
There are too many steps to get to where you need to get to. Setting up the backend is just complicated. Most people need this resource to simplify the outreach process and I don't think it was the case when we tried it. Overall this did not work for our current brand and the stage we were in. Not to say that we may not consider this again in the future.
While the support team was great - the time zone made scheduling a little tricky. Would have liked one training session that covered all the aspects of the tool however I understand there're many facets and each required its training. The multiple training days made it difficult to begin using the tool right away.

Recommendations to others considering Zymplify:
Look for someone with tech expertise. We came in at the beginning so I'm sure improvements have been made since then. It's a great tool if you know how to navigate and truly understand how it will benefit your business.

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
The goal was to use Zymplify to get potential Corporate Gifting clients for our business. The initial run did not yield the results we were looking for. When we began there was a system update so we put our campaigns etc. on pause until the new Zymplify was launched. I don't think we got what we were expecting that does not mean that it won't work for others. I did share the usage with the whole team as I believed it might work better for them that it did for Corporate Gifting

initial_reviews.review_title: Great product, very easy to use and you get fantastic support.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
Zymplify is a very good tool for sourcing new prospects, the support is good and the tool itself is easy to use. I like the fact you get LinkedIn profiles and phone numbers and the data was so easy to export. We used it with Zapier and HubSpot to make sure our data did not crossover in any way and the journeys could be fed with accurate data. knowing that contacts go through a journey and are primed and ready to go at the end is really valuable.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
Nothing really about the product, just that our company has a very niche place in the market so our pool of prospects is very small to start with therefore Zymplify doesn't help us add many prospects that we didn't already know. I would still recommend the tool to companies that have a larger pool of prospects though.

Recommendations to others considering Zymplify:
Use it, it's brilliant. You will be surprised by the amount of data you find out. It's really valuable for building leads and knowing that once a contact has been through a journey they are primed and ready for contact is great. The best bit for me was the import and export of data, so easy!!

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
Zymplify helped us find additional prospects that are searching our keywords. Data we wouldn't know without the tool. It also provides the information you can't get through other tools of this nature. It's a cut above as you get names and job titles as well as knowing the person who actually performed the search. This information isn't available through other tools as far as I know.

initial_reviews.review_title: The right idea but poor execution
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
Fully joined up approach to marketing and sales. Automation makes following up with contacts simple and convenient.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
The platform is centred around contacts and not companies. As a B2B organisation our sales teams often sell to multiple contacts within an organisation. Zymplify doesn't cater for this well.

The deal view is hard to read and only shows a small portion of the pipeline without scrolling.

When you add a deal it doesn't give you option to add close date and close percentage. You must add the deal and then go back into it to amend these fields. This is annoying.

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
Joining the dots within the commercial team to ensure we can drag a net across all the stats and make sure all of our clients and prospects feel valued.

Once set up Zymplify is very easy to use. It produces useful live data and metrics to track ongoing campaigns. It scales well when working with large data bases of users. Since using Zymplifiy we have gained a measured increase in our marketing activities and generated new leads.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
The initial setup of Zymplyfy was time-consuming. It also took some time to fully understand the 'journey' process, understand its full capabilities and then further testing to make sure the correct emails were sent out at the right time.

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
Increased attendance with key audiences via targeted email campaigns. Further interaction with key decision-makers due to they score based on activity within the campaign.

all_reviews.review_title: A very solid platform for new business CRM programs.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
First and foremost, when using a new platform, you want personal attention and education. Zymplify does that in spades. Our contact, Rebecca, couldn't be more attentive, kind, or smarter. We truly appreciate her, and her knowledge, advice, and leadership.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
It's not really a dislike. And it's probably not a fair dislike as we are a small agency and a couple of us use the platform while we perform our full-time executive roles. It would be better for us to have a FT person in this role but we don't. That said, the Zymplify platform is very robust. There's no way to understand the depths of all it offers on Day 1. So sometimes you learn new features or hacks as you go through the process and wish - 'I wish I knew that earlier.' Although they created a custom Playbook which is amazing, what would help would be a Playbook from Day 1 with a structured course, teacher, and assignments. Like a class at a university. Then we could always look back through the PDF course book, and easily remember where we were or what we needed to do again.

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
Zymplify really helps us think more strategically about how we approach new business, keeps us on a path to follow-up in a timely and effective manner and helps reveal new insights we would not have otherwise thought of.

all_reviews.review_title: Great Account Managers and Support, but lead quality not sufficient
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
Zimplify assigned me with a great Account Manager Suzanne, who was always on hand to help with anything we needed. From training, supervising important tasks, to answering support queries and following up, she was always there to ensure Paynetworx was happy.
The platform itself is good as a CRM system, it has a lot of good functionalities and allows you to do automation well. It's ideal for a company that has multiple sales people so the marketing can be streamlined and automated.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
There is no instagram plugin so I didnt use it for social media scheduling if i cant do everything on it at once.
The quality of the leads, some numbers are invalid, some numbers are missing, and most of the numbers are landline numbers that do not lead to the contact that has been revealed. This means for the leads we wanted access to, the quality we were expecting was not reflected with the data from the third party company.

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automation and viewing the results in an easy way.

all_reviews.review_content:

It assists users in saving money by pointing out possibilities to cut costs or bargain for lower rates. Additionally, the software offers customers insights into their spending patterns and assists them in creating more effective budgets.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
It has few software tool integrations, which could restrict its capabilities and make system integration challenging. Zymplify's pricing is a bit more expensive than those of other marketing automation platforms.

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
Many of the manual chores involved in lead generation and nurturing, such as email campaigns, social media management, and data input, can be automated with the aid of Zymplify. Businesses may benefit from time savings and increased efficiency as a consequence. Zymplify is gaining from managing the marketing initiatives because it will make it easier to see how effective their campaigns are and pinpoint areas where they can be improved.

all_reviews.review_title: Some improvement areas- but great platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
User interface experience
Data capture and prospecting tools
Intelligence of buyer signals
Ability to flow into a CRM function
Could Compare favourably vs our own CRM but leaves little scope for integration with finance and dealing with "tickets" or  "support" cases and CRM is not the main function of the platform as far as I can see.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
The inability to write into an API or gain an API to create integration with our own COTS CRM (Sage) / Sage ERP (200)
The amount of emails that land in junk from campaign and journey builds , what's the point in acquiring more credits if existing credits are not being picked up.

Recommendations to others considering Zymplify:
Have a look and see what it'll cost you to have
Sales Force, Mail Chimp, an ERP, lead forensic type tools, sales intelligent and prospecting tools and linkedin and marketing platform integrations and price it all up.
You dont need to really- it's all here. If it spoke to financial reporting systems through codeless integration technologies out there, it would be a game changer potentially for cloud/ cloud connected applications

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
Problems solved is reach- it gives us reach and automation, as long as we have good content and messaging.
Without the engine, we would be using 3/4 different tools
Performance is always improving as we are guided by their customer success and self learning platform, up to us to use it

all_reviews.review_title: Good but difficult to navigate
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
Option to pull professional resources from LinkedIn. Also, most of the contact information is vetted before pushing it out. Very few had errors but otherwise great. The support team was truly incredible - they were eager and willing to provide support - they were very thorough in the level of training that they provided.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
There are too many steps to get to where you need to get to. Setting up the backend is just complicated. Most people need this resource to simplify the outreach process and I don't think it was the case when we tried it. Overall this did not work for our current brand and the stage we were in. Not to say that we may not consider this again in the future.
While the support team was great - the time zone made scheduling a little tricky. Would have liked one training session that covered all the aspects of the tool however I understand there're many facets and each required its training. The multiple training days made it difficult to begin using the tool right away.

Recommendations to others considering Zymplify:
Look for someone with tech expertise. We came in at the beginning so I'm sure improvements have been made since then. It's a great tool if you know how to navigate and truly understand how it will benefit your business.

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
The goal was to use Zymplify to get potential Corporate Gifting clients for our business. The initial run did not yield the results we were looking for. When we began there was a system update so we put our campaigns etc. on pause until the new Zymplify was launched. I don't think we got what we were expecting that does not mean that it won't work for others. I did share the usage with the whole team as I believed it might work better for them that it did for Corporate Gifting

all_reviews.review_title: Great product, very easy to use and you get fantastic support.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
Zymplify is a very good tool for sourcing new prospects, the support is good and the tool itself is easy to use. I like the fact you get LinkedIn profiles and phone numbers and the data was so easy to export. We used it with Zapier and HubSpot to make sure our data did not crossover in any way and the journeys could be fed with accurate data. knowing that contacts go through a journey and are primed and ready to go at the end is really valuable.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
Nothing really about the product, just that our company has a very niche place in the market so our pool of prospects is very small to start with therefore Zymplify doesn't help us add many prospects that we didn't already know. I would still recommend the tool to companies that have a larger pool of prospects though.

Recommendations to others considering Zymplify:
Use it, it's brilliant. You will be surprised by the amount of data you find out. It's really valuable for building leads and knowing that once a contact has been through a journey they are primed and ready for contact is great. The best bit for me was the import and export of data, so easy!!

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
Zymplify helped us find additional prospects that are searching our keywords. Data we wouldn't know without the tool. It also provides the information you can't get through other tools of this nature. It's a cut above as you get names and job titles as well as knowing the person who actually performed the search. This information isn't available through other tools as far as I know.

all_reviews.review_title: The right idea but poor execution
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
Fully joined up approach to marketing and sales. Automation makes following up with contacts simple and convenient.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
The platform is centred around contacts and not companies. As a B2B organisation our sales teams often sell to multiple contacts within an organisation. Zymplify doesn't cater for this well.

The deal view is hard to read and only shows a small portion of the pipeline without scrolling.

When you add a deal it doesn't give you option to add close date and close percentage. You must add the deal and then go back into it to amend these fields. This is annoying.

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
Joining the dots within the commercial team to ensure we can drag a net across all the stats and make sure all of our clients and prospects feel valued.

To ensure Zymplify would meet your needs have a detailed meeting and demo with them first. Once you have established that then they will set up a detailed training program which is well delivered and structured.

Irrespective of your size of your business, you are getting main competitors functionality and more,  for a quarter of the price

No real downsides just improvements in functionality and "wouldnt it be good if"

all_reviews.review_title: Great Concept with Results
Platform was ok - they are always adding updates though
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
I like best about zymplify is that they would listen to your feedback and actually implement it. so if you had any concerns, you email the company and they try to include that suggestion into the next version of the platform.

I loved that zymplify was basically like an All-in-one platform/tool. I think you can purchase separate toolkits, but just to know that it was a one-stop shop for everything regarding Sales, Marking, CRM, etc. and that you didn't need to jump around to other tools was great.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
I really disliked the user-friendliness about Zymplify, they were in the process of updating the user interface but i think that was the biggest thing for me. Also, the support time is not the best for american companies, since it is based out of the US.

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
Zympllify offered a specific toolkit that other competitors did not offer - their prospecting tools were amazing. You could locate and reveal many contacts of people in any industry, the competitors, and the best part was that it was mostly automated so it helps our team save lots of time.

all_reviews.review_title: Zymplify: Innovative combination of marketing automation, lead gen via intent & integrated marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
Onboarding support and gorgeous email templates. I've been an admin for both Eloqua and Marketo but they can't beat Zymplify in these two areas.  The robust lead gen using intent software is so smart b/c it can feed directly into your email journey programs.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
1.  The integration with SFDC is limited so I have to use a connector platform like Zapier. 2.  Overwriting  the default URL that appears in the email inbox preview windows doesn't always work.  This is an issue for us since AWS is our competitor. 3. Would be great to have the ability to list multiple values separated by commas instead of a new field for each value. Ex:  When writing the logic for assigning leads by state, each state requires its own field instead of CA,UT,CO........

Recommendations to others considering Zymplify:
Great for lead gen as it uses intent software customizable by your keywords, personas, target accounts, events and LinkedIn Sales Navigator lists.  You can also integrate social media platforms. Hands down the best selection of email and landing page templates.

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are still in onboarding phase.

all_reviews.review_title: Good Marketing Automation Platform with some excellent features
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
The Buyer Intent / Contact reveal feature within the platform really set it apart from other platforms. We also use Hubspot, but the integration with G2, and the automated journeys meant we could run very sophisticated campaigns from within Zymplify.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
The user interface is very clumsy - it can take a while to get used to the different menus and options. Overall the automated journeys are difficult to setup, but Zymplify offer a very good onboarding schedule which takes you through these complexities, and also sets up the initial requirements.

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to prospect effectively to people we knew were engaging with us through different platforms. Initially this was through the G2 reviews platform, but we expanded it to Capterra, and Lead Forensics. The system allows you to automate follow-ups and prospecting. We've been running this since mid 2020 and it generated leads with relatively low manual input required.

all_reviews.review_title: Not just another marketing automation system! It works end to end, from prospects to leads to sales.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
Zymplify includes all the features you expect to find in a marketing automation platform but what really sets it apart is their focus on helping you work faster through prospecting. The automated tools allow you to quickly add leads to your funnel. Then you can use multi-channel campaigns to get your business in front of them. Managing all these channels from one place gives us so much more time to focus on being creative in our marketing.
Also, the support from the Zymplify team is exceptional. If we come up against a problem we know we can reach out and they will help us sort it out. This was invaluable when we were trying to get our team up to speed in the early days of using the system.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
So far we haven't come across anything major that we dislike and any minor issues have been dealt with by their helpful support team.

Recommendations to others considering Zymplify:
The speed with which you can get a campaign up and running allows you to get so much more done. Zymplify helps you feel in control - seeing everything in one place allows you to get a real handle on what's working and what isn't.

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Zymplify to manage marketing campaigns for our clients. Also, with the increased focus on lead prospecting and nurturing we have been able to demonstrate increased value to our clients as they see us helping them close more sales. We have found the custom dashboards really beneficial in illustrating to clients what is going on with their campaigns - focusing on what really matters to them and presenting it in an easily understood manner. This has helped convert even the most sceptical of customers to the benefits of digital marketing campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: Using Zymplify
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
We've used quite a few products in this market before but, for me, the thing that sets Zymplify apart from the rest is their team.  The product works and does some really amazing things to run effective campaigns but without their team, they would just be another software company in my opinion.  Their team are great, there is never a silly question, there is so much experience in there as to how to get the most from a campaign and it's budget and I think that they are the difference.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
I don't think we've found any yet.  I think because they are quite a new company in this sector they have to be quite aggressive with their growth and development with their products, so instead of documentation on a new product, it seems to be you jump on a Zoom call.  But you always get the recording afterwards and the flip side is that you get to interact with a human and ask relevant questions to how you intend on using the platform.

Recommendations to others considering Zymplify:
Chat to the team, they know their product and know how it will help you/your business, it certainly has for us.

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Zymplify to manage and deliver our automated marketing campaigns, allowing us to track all areas of the campaign from spend and ROI, open rates, click rates.  It manages our sales pipeline, lead generation and sales funnel and keeps it all in one place.

all_reviews.review_title: Powerful, insightful and a game changing platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
As someone who has their own content and digital marketing agency, I love looking at the data. My favourite feature of Zymplify by far is the depth of the data and insights you can get into how everything is performing across your platform, on one dashboard. I love creating automated journeys and the intelligent scoring system meaning I can send different prospects in different directions and serve them content relevant to that campaign. I also manage Zymplify for my clients and we've grown their email open rates (to cold lists) by over 5% in 6 weeks. We've also captured over 400 new leads through this campaign with no paid advertising and all organic traffic.  I absolutely love how easy Zymplify makes it and I feel like I've only scratched the surface with what they have to offer.  The support is also amazing, the team are always on hand to help you talk through any issues or offer some teaching to help you improve the way you use the software and set up campaigns.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
They are updating things all the time and I see constant improvements. The builders are not quite as fluid as I'd like, however, the sheer power of the entire platform far outweights any small niggles such as this.

Recommendations to others considering Zymplify:
Just do it! Amazing company, great values and support.

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
Knowing which content is working and where we need work. We've been able to identify the most popular types of content and see where customers make their journey by being able to identify each click.  The power of the automated journeys and knowing that prospects are being nurtured and put into a pipeline when they are ready to speak to someone from the team.

all_reviews.review_title: Early Adopters who have used Zymplify to deliver service to clients
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
I like the all in one aspect. We are an agency and being able to create marketing campaigns that can be tracked and measured in one software is a HUGE benefit.  The knowledge behind the systematic approach to the platform is obvious and with marketing in mind.
The system is easy to use and quick to master. We are able to train new starters and have them up to speed within a week usually and certifies users with a month.
The company has worked with us to develop the platform to suit both agency and consumer needs. They have taken on board feedback and either implemented changed or plan to in the future.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
Through the years the system has been quite buggy and it has been frustrating at times that seemingly small issues arise.  Zymplify has worked with us through to work through these bugs and resolve issues.

Recommendations to others considering Zymplify:
If you are a small to medium agency that does not want to have to re-sell a partner software as part of your package, Zymplify is an affordable and effective software that has helped us and our clients grow.  If using to help marketing a single business you will have your mind blown at how all that you need is right there in the software. No more multiple login details for your email software, your landing page creator, your social scheduler. Just create your message, target the right people and use the right platforms - Zymplify helps with all of this.

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
Track and measure. All clients want to know that the work being produced is or is not creating results. Zymplify helps us speed up our workflow and be able to show our clients exactly where their traffic and leads are coming from.
Being able to create a landing page, schedule social content, blog, email all from one platform for each instance for our clients was an issue in continuity and productivity as we had several accounts for differing clients. Being able to create an entire campaign funnel a ta few clicks if necessary is a big benefit to our employees and clients.

all_reviews.review_title: Simple and effective tool to drive outbound demand and sales using intent and automation
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
Everything you need is in one place - you can get marketing automation done with customised journeys and campaigns, landing pages, scoring; you can enrich leads with intent signals from a number of sources, reveal contact information for key buyer personas and track your cost per acquisition all the way through the funnel; manage the deal through to  closure.

All this is provided in a really cost effective way - predictable costs and you don't pay way more from simply using loads of contact information.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
The biggest challenge at the moment is that if you use other marketing automation or CRM tools, you will have to integrate using some integration tools as they are still working on out of the box connectors. I am sure in time this will be released and help with the implementation process.

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
The hardest thing for companies that have small marketing and sales teams is being able to leverage buyer intent data like the bigger companies. Zymplify makes it easy to get data about what companies are in the market on places like g2.com and prospect to them in high volumes at scale. By the time the prospect is engaged and ready to buy, we can get this in the hands of the sales team and significantly increase our conversion rates.

all_reviews.review_title: This platform is affordable, easy to use and will benefit your company in all aspects of Marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
The Scheduling of emails/social posts allows us to be consistent with our content. The easy to use CRM helps us keep on top of new leads coming in and who we should be talking to. The content calender is a very good tool for a small company like us. Myself as marketing executive will update this calendar monthly and will create the content whenever I can and have it approved. The automated marketing journeys is the most useful tool I have used so far, this has allowed us to nurture all of our contacts and let us figure out who is hot/cold. The Zym score plays a big part in this for us as it determines the results for us.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
There is no real issues I would have with Zymplify, it is all easy to use and if you have any questions or need support their team is always on hand to assist you. We do not use all of the services available yet as we are quiet new to the platform but everything we have used so far is very helpful and beneficial to our company.

Recommendations to others considering Zymplify:
I would highly recommend Zymplify to anyone who is considering changing their current systems. If you are looking for a platform where you can control all your social and email content from one place you wont find a more practical platform than Zymplify. It will help you save time and be more consistent with content you are producing. It also gives you a content calendar which allows you to plan ahead and plan on when you need certain pieces of work completed.

The CRM database is easy to use and very helpful to find out what relationship you have with them once you have integrated Microsoft Outlook to the platform. Every conversation you have with a contact will be saved in their profile and will allow you to view past conversations when needed.

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
We now have more structure to our email and social media marketing with consistent content being published. The automated journeys is a fantastic tool to get people started on the journey of explaining what your company is and how we can benefit them. The Zym scoring is a vital part of our strategy and this tells us exactly how hot/cold that lead may be.

Simple to building landing pages enables us to create professional branding data capture channels to engage new leads.
Receiving qualified leads means we get to have better quality conversations from the outset.

The regular webinars provided by the client support team and there newsletters provide great insights and tips to what we can do better in our own marketing strategy.

Easy to use CRM that tracks and moves leads through the sales cycle

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
It would be great if you could post more than one image to social media & if you could upload videos to social media from the platform

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
They could be a little bit stronger when it comes to integrations, but that is something I only find to be a minor quibble, not a full-on flaw. I'm yet to try out the analytics side, so will hold fire on that until a later date.

Recommendations to others considering Zymplify:
It's an affordable alternative and long-term prospect, as they are at a stage where they'd like to partner with you provided you can bring some clients along. The product itself is reliable and joins up all of your main digital marketing channels effectively.

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're helping clients realise the benefits of inbound marketing campaigns and automation, all in one package. The problems they have encountered were the manpower and know-how to take on inbound/automation in house.

all_reviews.review_title: The Zymplify Platform has enabled us to centralise our marketing efforts its great!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
The scheduling of social posts in advance, also the SMS feature which is an unusual added bonus.  Building customer specific personas helps us to ensure that our content is on point and what that audience wants to see to ensure a high level of engagement.  The ability to automate our entire customer journey is valuable and to be able to see all our campaigns run in real time. The  tracking capabilities and reporting allows us to monitor at a glance how each of our campaigns are performing ensuring we can track what campaigns are working for us. And to know that we can pick up the phone at any time to one of the Zymplify team who are always willing to help and guide us in the right direction.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
Honestly so far there is nothing that i dislike about the product.

Recommendations to others considering Zymplify:
I would recommend this product if you are resource poor in times of managing your marketing efforts.

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
As an SME with a small number of employees the platform saves us time and money while helping us engage and tailor our marketing efforts to our specific target market in a really straight forward way.  In the past we found that marketing in general was hard to keep on top of as we were using a lot of different software and paying a lot of different vendors while not really being able to work out any ROI.   With Zymplify all our marketing efforts are centralised on one platform which runs in real time enabling us to see a visible ROI and also to figure out what campaigns are working for our business.  By using the platform the quality of our inbound leads has increased which is very positive as these leads have a high potential of becoming our future customers.

all_reviews.review_title: Fantastic Customer Service and Flexibility
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
The team of people working on the various projects we are working on are fantastic. Always available for any queries i may have and they are not afraid to point out where we might be going wrong with our approach. Becky, Jemma and Carly have been particularly proactive which is exactly what we need. This pro activeness has really helped to strengthen our product offering and we are on the right track to deliver the 'gold standard' of this type of lead generation. Zymplify's willingness to understand our business and specific requirements has also really helped to drive a successful implementation.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
There are no specific dislikes. The standard commercial model on which Zymplify operates is not fully compatible with the outsourcing model which I operate which can sometimes cause a sticking point, however, I must stress that the team have been incredibly flexible and creative when looking at solutions for this.

Recommendations to others considering Zymplify:
The technology platform itself has an incredible amount of features and the support team are incredibly helpful and honest.

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
Two things: B2B lead generation for a large UK Telco and B2C lead generation for a brand that we own. With the B2B project, it is often a challenge to generate any significant volume of leads. Zymplify have designed a new approach which will be unique in the sector and help us to drive the volume we need. For B2C we are utilizing the extensive experience within Zymplify to support our existing lead generation.

What do you like best about Zymplify?
As an SME, time spent on marketing can be limited. Zymplify allow us to use our limited time focus on one platform to do all our marketing activities. Campaigns can all be linked through social media, emails and website activity.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
Very little to dislike. Full integration with Instagram is probably the only issue we have come across. However support and work arounds are great.

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
In an SME, marketing time is limited with no specific marketing team. Focus can be given to a signal platform to cover all marketing activity and to see the results as they happen.

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Dental Laboratory Owner creating perfect smiles for your patients

all_reviews.review_title: Great for Small Businesses
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zymplify?
Definitely use if you are thinking of staring a business this program allows you a plethora of solutions in order to get your business off the ground. You are able to personalize your business and you have access to multiple tools that will help further your business. I like that you also have access to speaking with someone on the marketing team if you need assistance.

What do you dislike about Zymplify?
I think that they need to have more people on the marketing team. Sometimes it can be difficult to reach someone, but once you do get in touch they are very helpful and knowledgeable.

Recommendations to others considering Zymplify:
Take your time ans ask questions

What problems is Zymplify solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am able to get my business off the ground and operating efficiently.
